string.name: range_header_prompt
string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking dates within the calendar to form a range

string.name: header_prompt
string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking a date within the calendar

string.name: confirm
string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will save the user's selection

string.name: cancel
string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will ignore the user's selection
